column5: I know what the traffic is like at the (June) IFalls border crossing. I usually go thru there on Sundays now. Saturday's wait is just too long for me - I'd pee myself! I'm going back to Canada this coming weekend - Saturday or Sunday, haven't decided yet. For those of you who have made the trip recently, or made the trip in late August or early September in other years, what's the traffic situation at the IFalls border this time of year? Thx
The most I have waited on the Saturday of Labor Day weekend was 1 hour and 45 minutes. That was from the time I got in line until I got to the booth.
Also, you can check the website of wait times. If it is too long, you can always head over to Baudette.
Sorry, meant to include this in the last post. Good luck on your trip. Website of Canada wait times.http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/bwt-taf/menu-eng.html

Once the kids go back to school and all the summer trips have been made the line is short. I've frequently travel through the I-Falls border crossing in late summer, Labor Day weekend and in the fall. I don't think I've ever had a line longer than 15 minutes.
